content:
Over the past day, the enemy was struck by 447 to 8 settlements of Zaporizhzhya region.

About thisinformsHead of Zaporizhzhya Ova Ivan Fedorov.

“The Russian servicemen made 1 rocket and 6 aviation strikes on Malinovka, a robot and a small toct. 11 Gulyaypol RSSV, Little Tokmachka, Robot and Levadny, ”he said.

140 UAV attacked Zaporozhye, Gulyaypole, Novoandriivka, Malynivka, a robot, a small Tokmachka and Levadne.

289 Artudaries came in the territory of Guliaypol, Robovy, Malynivka, Little Tokmachka, Levadny and Novoandriivka.

“There have been 24 reports of the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure. The civilians were not injured, ”said the head of Zaporizhzhya Ova.

As reportedArmyinform, On March 23 at about 5:45 pm, the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation struck a rocket strike in the Slobid district of Kharkiv.
title: The enemy per day made almost 450 beats in the Zaporozhye region
description: About it reports the head of Zaporizhzhya Ova Ivan Fedorov. «RF Servicemen ...
author: Army Inform
